entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning near noon. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 60 this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending near midnight then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 2.
